name: Canto
desc: Can move again after certain actions.

name: Flying
desc: Can fly.

name: Feat
desc: Placeholder for feats

name: Strength +5
desc: Grants STR +5.

name: Resistance +5
desc: Grants RES +5.

name: Defense +5
desc: Grants DEF +5.

name: Speed +5
desc: Grants SPD +5.

name: Skill +5
desc: Grants SKL +5.

name: Luck +5
desc: Grants LCK +5.

name: Dragonstone
desc: Grants STR +12, SKL +12, DEF +15, RES+20.

name: Poisoned
desc: Inflicts -2 to all stats.

name: Resist+
desc: Grants additional RES.

name: Stoneskin
desc: Take half damage but inflicts -2 SPD.

name: Stunned
desc: Unit cannot act.

name: Sleep
desc: Unit is asleep.

name: Petrify
desc: Unit is petrified. Cannot avoid enemy attacks and suffers -30 dodge.

name: Rescue
desc: Unit is weighed down with a traveler.

name: Steal
desc: Can steal items from enemies with lower speed.

name: Locktouch
desc: Unit can opened locks without a key.

name: Crit +30
desc: Grants +30 Critical change

name: Crit +15
desc: Grants +15 Critical change

name: Anticrit
desc: Grants immunity to critical hits.

name: Wretched Air
desc: Grants STR +10, SKL +10, DEF +10, RES +10.

name: Demon Light
desc: Grants MAG +10, SKL +10, LCK +10, DEF +10, RES +15.

name: Ravager
desc: Grants STR +15, SKL +15, DEF +15, RES +15.

name: Silence
desc: Unit cannot use magic.

name: Berserk
desc: Unit is confused and can no longer tell friend from foe.

name: Torch
desc: Grants increased sight range in fog of war.

name: Void Curse
desc: No exp gained for attacking this unit.

name: Inspiration
desc: Aura - Grants +1 damage and +1 resist to allies.

name: Inspired
desc: Grants +1 damage and +1 resist.

name: Leader's Ward
desc:
Reduces damage taken by 50% if HP is full. 
Grants Leader's Protection to allies within 2 spaces.

name: Leader's Protection
desc: Reduces damage taken by 20% if HP is full.

name: Regeneration
desc: Regenerate HP every turn.

name: Regeneration
desc: Regenerate a fifth of max HP every turn.

name: Poisoned
desc: All stats lowered by 2.

name: Resistant
desc: Grants increased magical resistance.

name: Barkskin
desc: Grants DEF/RES +6, but inflicts SPD/MOV -2.

name: Stun
desc: Paralyzed. Cannot move, attack, or counterattack.

name: Good Fortune
desc: Grants hit +50.

name: Clear
desc: Removes most negative statuses.

name: Reflect
desc: Negative statuses are reflected back at the attacker.

name: Skill Restore
desc: Fully charges all activated skills.

name: Dazzled
desc: Inflicts Hit -10.

name: Blinded
desc: Inflicts Hit -100.

name: Chilled
desc: Inflicts Avoid -10.

name: Frostbite
desc: Inflicts SPD -3.

name: Starcrossed
desc: Inflicts Hit/Avo -15. Also inflicts Hit/Avo -20 on nearby enemies

name: Starcrossed
desc: Inflicts Hit/Avo -20.

name: Leadership Aura
desc: Reduces damage taken by unit and nearby allies when HP is full.

name: Leader's Ward
desc: Reduces damage taken when HP is full.

name: Blaze
desc: If unit's HP is lower than 50%, grants Hit+10 and Mt+5 during combat.

name: Armsward
desc: Reduces damage taken by half this unit's STR.

name: Magic Ward
desc: Protection granted by the Magic Rondache

name: Heavy Armor
desc: Protection granted by the Onyx Bulwark

name: Light Aegis
desc: Protection granted by the Light Aegis

name: Earth Aegis
desc: Protection granted by the Magic Rondache

name: Dark Aegis
desc: Protection granted by the Magic Rondache

name: Force of Wisdom
desc: Combat Art. Increases damage dealt by this unit's magical power

name: Charm
desc: Grants allied units within 3 spaces Hit +10, Dmg +2.

name: Charm
desc: Increases Damage dealt and accuracy.

name: Clairvoyance
desc: Crit+5. Grants Hit/Avo+10 during combat against Tome users

name: Seer
desc: If foe initiates combat, grants Hit/Avoid +20.

name: Hastermarch
desc: Adjacent Allies with HP>=50% can move one extra space.

name: Hastemarch
desc: Movement +1.

name: Veteran's Guidance
desc: Grants Def/Res + 2 and Hit/Avo + 10 to allies within 2 spaces.

name: Veteran's Pointers
desc: Grants Def/Res + 2 and Hit/Avo + 10. Listen to your elders.

name: Foul Trickery
desc: Inflicts Str/Mag/Def/Res -3 on foes within 3 spaces.

name: Foul Trickery
desc: Str/Mag/Def/Res -3.

name: Berserk Blow
desc: If unit initiates combat, grants Mt+10, but increases damage taken by 50%.

name: Strength +2
desc: Grants STR +2.

name: Magic +2
desc: Grants MAG +2.

desc: Grants SKL +3.

desc: Grants SPD +2.

desc: Grants DEF +2.

desc: Grants RES +2.

desc: Grants CON +3.

desc: Grants MOV +1.

name: Vitae
desc: Grants HP + 10.

name: Fortuna
desc: Grants LCK +4.

name: Speed +2
desc: Grants SPD +2.

name: Speed -2
desc: Inflicts SPD -2.

name: Defense +2
desc: Grants DEF +2.

name: Resistance +2
desc: Grants RES +2.

name: Resistance +10
desc: Grants RES +10.

name: Underdog
desc: Grants Damage +2 and Damage Taken -2 against enemies with greater max HP.

name: Luck +10
desc: Gain LCK +10.

name: Merchant
desc: Can buy items at reduced prices.

name: Swordbreaker
desc: Grants Hit/Avoid +30 against enemies wielding Swords.

name: Lancebreaker
desc: Grants Hit/Avoid +30 against enemies wielding Lances.

name: Axebreaker
desc: Grants Hit/Avoid +30 against enemies wielding Axes.

name: Passive Regen
desc: Recover some HP while holding Swordstaff

name: Passive Regen
desc: Regain some HP by being close to Swordstaff

name: Imperial Wards
desc: Grants STR/MAG/SKL/SPD/DEF/RES +5.

name: Canto
desc: Can move again after taking certain actions.

name: Canto+
desc: Can move again after taking an action.

name: Rescuing
desc: Halves SKL/SPD.

name: Rally
desc: Command Skill. Grants Def/Res+2 to an adjacent ally for a turn.

name: Rallied
desc: Granted Def/Res+2.

name: Rally
desc: Activated. Grant all allies within a 3 tile radius +4 to all stats for one turn.

name: Locktouch
desc: Open doors and chests without a key.

name: Savior
desc: Rescue without penalty.

name: Ghost
desc: Move through enemy units.

name: Fleet of Foot
desc: Ignore some terrain movement penalties.

name: Resist Status
desc: Ignore temporary status ailments after 1 turn.

name: Evasion
desc: Area of Effect attacks always miss this unit.

name: Prescience
desc: If attacking, grants Hit/Avoid +15 and Damage +1.

name: Patience
desc: If attacked, grants Hit/Avoid +15 and Damage +1.

name: Riposte
desc: If attacked, grants Damage +3.

name: Initiative
desc: If attacking, grants Avoid +30.

name: Overwhelm
desc: If attacking and damage would defeat enemy, grants Hit +30.

name: Poise
desc: If attacking, DEF/RES +5.

name: Empowered
desc: If attacking, Damage +3.

name: Shimmer
desc: Grants Avoid +30 against non-adjacent attackers.

name: Rex Aegis
desc: Grants Avoid +500 and Defense +100 vs. enemies more than two tiles away.

name: Heavy Hitter
desc: Adds half weapon weight to damage.

name: Charge
desc: Adds (distance moved - 2) this turn to damage.
components: max(0, Utility.calculate_distance(self.position, self.previous_position) - 2) if self.position else 0

name: Focus
desc: Grants Hit/Avoid +20 if no allies are within 3 tiles.

name: Synergy
desc: Grants Hit/Avoid +10 if an ally is within 3 tiles.

name: Futuresight
desc: Grants Hit/Avoid +30 if HP is under half.

name: Conductance
desc: Grants Hit +15 and Damage +1 against enemies wielding metal weapons.

name: Miracle
desc: Once per chapter, if this unit would die, instead they survive with 1 HP.

name: Healtouch
desc: Heal +5 HP when healing another.

name: Vantage
desc: If 4 more attack speed than enemy, double counterattack while defending.

name: Cleave
desc: Combat Art. Prereq: Axe. Damages all adjacent enemy units.

name: Trueshot
desc: Combat Art. +100 hit on next attack.

name: Metamagic
desc: Automatic Art. When charged, next attack has increased area of blast +1.

name: Overcharged
desc: Next attack or spell has increased area of effect.

name: Shove
desc: Activated. Push a unit one square away.

name: Swap
desc: Activated. Swap position with an adjacent unit.

name: Push
desc: Activated. Pushes unit 3 spaces away.

name: Refresh
desc: Activated. Adjacent unit is refreshed.

name: Fade
desc: Activated. Grants Avoid +100 for 5 turns or until you next attack.

name: Aegis
desc: Activated. RNG: 1. Grant ally DEF/RES +15 until next turn.

name: Revelation
desc: Activated. RNG: 1. Grants ally Hit/Avoid +100 until next turn.

name: Invoke
desc: Command Skill. Invokes the soul of a warrior to assist you in combat.

name: Summon
desc: Command Skill. Summons a familiar to aid you.

name: Summon
desc: Command Skill. Summons a familiar to aid you.

name: Summon
desc: Summons a familiar to aid you. Mana cost: 10

name: Luna
desc: Proc. SKL%. Ignore enemy's Defense or Resistance.

name: Sol
desc: Activated. Recover HP equal to damage dealt to the enemy.

name: Devil's Luck
desc: Chance to kill self -- horribly

name: Vantage
desc: Proc. Attack first even on defense.

name: Pavise
desc: Proc. Ignore attacker's damage.

name: Adept
desc: Proc. SPD% Attack again.

name: Swordfaire
desc: While wielding a sword, it gains the brave property.

name: Lancefaire
desc: While wielding a lance, cannot be counterattacked.

name: Axefaire
desc: While wielding an axe, ignore half enemy's Defense or Resistance.

name: Longshot
desc: While wielding a bow, attack range +1.

name: Slayer
desc: Effective against monsters

name: Celeste
desc: Weaken enemies struck by your weapons.

name: Slow
desc: Slow enemies struck by your weapons.

name: Nosferatu
desc: Damage dealt restores health.

name: Skill Aura
desc: Aura. Grants allies SKL +3.

name: Defense Aura
desc: Aura. Grants allies DEF +2.

name: Resistance Aura
desc: Aura. Grants allies RES +2.

name: Charisma
desc: Aura. Grants allies Hit/Avoid +15.

name: Hex
desc: Aura. Inflicts Avoid -15 on enemies.

name: Provoke
desc: After battle, inflicts Hit -30 and Damage -2 when attacking other units.

name: Command
desc: Your spells strengthen affected allies.

name: Refreshed
desc: Refreshed.

name: Raging
desc: Raging. Grants STR/SKL/SPD/RES +4

name: Faded
desc: Faded. Grants Avoid +100. Lost on attack.

name: Aegis
desc: Grants DEF/RES +15.

name: Revelation
desc: Grants Hit/Avoid +100.

name: Flying
desc: Grants flying.

name: Provoked
desc: Hit -30 and Damage -2 when attacking units other than the one provoking it.

name: Commanded
desc: Grants Damage +5.

name: Slowed
desc: Inflicts MOV -3.

name: Impeded
desc: Movement reduced somewhat.

name: Rallied
desc: Grants +4 to all stats.

name: Maximum HP -5
desc: Inflicts HP -5.

name: Movement Clause
desc: Non-mounted units gain Mov +2.

name: Quadriga
desc:
Grants STR/SPD/DEF+2 to unit and adjacent allies 
if there are allies adjacent.

name: Quadriga
desc: You shouldn't see this.

name: Plenitude
desc:
Combat Art. Unit restores HP equal to
Half of damage dealt. Unit cannot follow-up.
components: (item_system.weapon_type(unit, unit.get_weapon()) == 'Sword' or item_system.weapon_type(unit, unit.get_weapon()) == 'Lance' or item_system.weapon_type(unit, unit.get_weapon()) == 'Axe')

name: Windsweep
desc:
Combat Art. Unit cannot follow-up
Stuns foe for one turn. Dmg+3.
components: item_system.weapon_type(unit, unit.get_weapon()) == 'Sword' or item_system.weapon_type(unit, unit.get_weapon()) == 'Lance' or item_system.weapon_type(unit, unit.get_weapon()) == 'Axe'

name: Swept
desc:
Struck by windsweep. Avo-10. 
Cannot move until next turn.
